description.p: Typically spoken by dwarves, humans, high-elves, halflings, rock gnomes and half-elves in Dragernes Dal. On top of this, half-orcs, tieflings and dragonborns also speak it but not as their native tongue.

setters.set: Dwarves, humans, high-elves, halflings, rock gnomes, half-elves, half-orcs, tieflings, dragonborns

description.p: Typically spoken by races living more than 100+ years and have irregular contact with the world, meaning wood-elves, marsh-elves and forest gnomes in Dragernes Dal. It is also spoken by the elite in Daler Grevskabet and is often a prerequisite for being accepted as a member.

setters.set: Dwarves, humans, high-elves, halflings, rock gnomes, half-elves
